About Us

Hi, I’m John Turner, founder of SeedProd. I have been a web developer for over 10 years and have been build WordPress Themes and Plugins for over 5 years.

I started SeedProd with the goal in mind to provide you with 1st class quality plugins and support for WordPress. Unlike many of the free plugins in the WordPress.org repository, I wanted to create plugins designers, developers and users could depend on. I focus on creating plugins that are secure, reliable and up-to-date with WordPress’s constant changing API.

If you have any questions or just want to say hi, contact me!
